description:
go.tools/ssa: s/Literal/Const/g, s/Constant/NamedConst/g

(Motivation: "Literal" is a syntactic property, not a semantic one.)

Also: delete a "TODO: opt" that the lifting pass already does for us.

Also: delete a "TODO: opt" that the lifting pass already does for us.
